answer: RAHI (Karigar 360) is a mission-driven platform connecting Belief, Fairness, and Work with Dignity. We provide an ethical alternative to gig-economy platforms by ensuring worker autonomy and fair pay.
To join the RAHI community, click 'Register' at the top. You can sign up as a User to book help, or as a Karigar (Professional) to offer your skills and earn with dignity.
Click the 'Login' button at the top right to access your dashboard. You'll need your registered email and password.

We offer a wide range of services from vetted professionals. Visit our Services page to browse categories like plumbing, electrical, and more. Once you find what you need, booking takes just a few clicks!
RAHI ensures workers receive immediate payments. We believe in same-day payouts to empower our Karigars and maintain a transparent, trust-based financial model.
After booking, you can use our real-time Tracking page to see exactly where your professional is and their estimated arrival time. Trust through transparency is our core principle.
Our Investor Pitch Deck and Overview Reports detail the RAHI model of 'Connecting Belief, Fairness & Work with Dignity'. We are focused on human trust rather than just algorithmic marketplaces.

The RAHI interface is designed for simplicity. From the home page, you can search for services, view professional profiles, and book directly. Our 'Step-by-Step Interface Flow' document ensures a seamless experience for both users and workers.

RAHI's mission is to provide 'Urgent Human Help' while preserving the dignity of workers. Unlike other platforms, we don't use punitive algorithms; we empower workers to control their own time and pricing.
A Karigar on RAHI is more than a service provider; they are empowered professionals who own their work. We provide them with the tools to grow their business with dignity and support.
